name: Cube Room Curse
description:
An entry for Kenney Jam 2020. Very not finished, but feel free to try it anyway.

You insulted an old man a few days ago and you think you heard him mumbled a few Latin words with anger while glaring at you. That has to be a curse. Definitely.

Now, you find yourself in a mysterious room ....

Control:

  • Press the arrow button on the screen sides to rotate the camera
  • Click on object to interact with them
